code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"./WeatherForecast.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function WeatherForecast(props){const[forecast,setForecast]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{function handleForecastResponse(response){setForecast(response.data.daily);}if(props.coordinates){const apiKey="97f8e93f00107773f88eafd933ce86b7";const latitude=props.coordinates.lat;const longitude=props.coordinates.lon;let apiUrl="https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/onecall?lat=".concat(latitude,"&lon=").concat(longitude,"&appid=").concat(apiKey,"&units=metric");axios.get(apiUrl).then(handleForecastResponse).catch(error=>{console.error("Error fetching forecast data: ",error);});}},[props.coordinates]);if(forecast){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"WeatherForecast",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row justify-content-center",children:forecast.slice(0,5).map((dailyForecast,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"WeatherForecast-day text-center",children:new Date(dailyForecast.dt*1000).toLocaleDateString("en-US",{weekday:"short"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"WeatherForecast-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"http://openweathermap.org/img/wn/".concat(dailyForecast.weather[0].icon,".png"),alt:dailyForecast.weather[0].description})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"WeatherForecast-temperatures text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"WeatherForecast-temperature-max",children:[Math.round(dailyForecast.temp.max),"\xB0"]})," ","/"," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"WeatherForecast-temperature-min",children:[Math.round(dailyForecast.temp.min),"\xB0"]})]})]},index))})});}else{return null;}}
